name: Blender Cycles Flora 014.001
description:
Species: Polish malachite azurite

A derivative of the Mixed MIneral series, this body of work is a commentary on the politics of crossing borders, extraction of precious minerals from developing countries, and the navigation of multiple identities and cultures. The minerals are from developing and developed countries known for their mined resources and the local communities that mine them.

Forms are developed with Blender 2.93.6 Cycles experimental engine. Images of minerals are manipulated through procedural settings in Blender resulting in objects resembling flora, some more organic, others more crystalline.
